name: Eiroa - CBT Maduro - 4 x 40
additionalNotes: The Eiroa CBT Maduro name comes from the fact that the three parts of the cigar, wrapper, binder, and filler (in Spanish, Capa, Banda and Tripa) are maduro tobacco. Blended by Christian Eiroa of CLE Cigars at the Aladino factory in Honduras. CBT Maduro makes use of 100% maduro leaves – the wrapper, binder, and filler are all maduro leaves harvested from only the plant’s top primings. An extremely difficult-to-blend combination, but Eiroa nailed it…again. CBT Maduro is smooth and ultra-rich with hearty, charred notes of wood, pepper, espresso, dark chocolate, and a long, bold, and meaty finish.
